markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Lurching Rush](/Actions.aspx?ID=492) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 74</row>

</column>

---

The monitor lizard Strides and then makes a jaws Strike. If it moved at least 20 feet away from its starting position, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to this attack roll.
name: Lurching Rush
